title: Bloomberg Markets: Ford CFO on Long-Term Tech Investments
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Ford CFO on Long-Term Tech Investments
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Robert L Shanks Exec VP/CFO Ford Motor Co Discussing the company's capital deployments in the area of technology and the impact autonomous vehicles could have on the car industry.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
